title: South Africa : digital population as of January 2020
summary: In 2020 , close to half of all digital ad users in the Africa was generated through Active_internet_users Digital .
About a third of the users came from digital Active_mobile_internet_users that year .
Active_social_media_users Digital in the United StatesIn 2020 , digital in the Africa generated a total users of about 107 millions South Africa dollars .
gold: This statistic presents the digital population in South Africa as of January 2020 . During this period of time , it was found that South Africa had 36.54 million internet users , of which 34.93 million were mobile internet users .
